JENTRY_GT_PROFIT: Book ko profit hua. Book ko amount lena hai
JENTRY_GT_LOSS: Book ko nuksaan hua. Book ko amount dena hai.
JENTRY_FORM_PAY: Agar kisi ke naam maadne hai to isme amount daale. Naam ka matlab hum usko amount de rahe hai.
JENTRY_FORM_RECEIVE: Agar kisi ke jama karne hai to isme amount daale. Jama ka matlab humko amount mila hai.
ABOUT_REPORT_BALANCE_SHEET: -ve Right columns Ka matlab book loss mein hai Or + Left columsn ka matlab book ko profit hai
ABOUT_REPORT_PL_MATCHWISE: - ka matlab Book loss mein hai Or + ka matlab Book Profit mein hai
ABOUT_REPORT_CONNECT: - ka matlab Book loss mein hai Or + ka matlab Book Profit mein hai
